li.label: ate tiberium meat
li.description: I ate some glowing, green crunchy meat. I think I'm dying.

li.label: ate cooked tiberium meat
li.description: I ate a meal cooked from glowing, crunchy meat. The seasoning partly covered the taste, but there were spikey pieces and now a burning sensation is covering my tongue. I feel sick.

li.label: ate mutated meat
li.description: I ate some glowing, tough meat, it tastes terrible.

li.label: ate cooked mutated meat
li.description: I ate a meal cooked from glowing meat. The seasoning partly covers the horrible aftertaste.
